name: Gold Star Mortgage Financial Group
tag_list: full-service-mortgage-business, financial-services, mortgages, mortgage-loans, home-mortgages, refinances, refinancing, cash-out-refinance, home-refinance, home-purchase-loans, home-equity-loans, home-equity-line-of-credit, mortgage-bankers
overview: Gold Star Mortgage Financial Group of Fort Lauderdale, FL is a full service mortgage business. It is our primary fiduciary goal to build and develop relationships with our clients that are professional and last a lifetime. At Gold Star Mortgage, our goal is to represent the highest quality principals in an ethical and professional manner in all aspects of our business. We often engage in counseling our customers, providing customized loan programs, and helping them to pursue financial freedom. Gold Star Mortgage Financial Group always delivers on the promise of fantastic products, great interest rates, and career paths that have consistently attracted top performing mortgage bankers.
